name: Grandmaster Koi
description:
Look at colors. Get great advice in garbled-up alien fish-speak. Click to reset the colors and get more advice. This game is mostly finished. I may animate the Grandmaster's ASCII later. *NOTE* because the colors are random, the text is sometimes unreadable. Sorry.

Version 1.0.1

-fixed problem with clicking refresh link in iFrame (replaced with a JS function)
